actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the application of section 584(h) of such Code.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a rule for the nonrecognition of gain for certain distributions of regulated investment company stock by common trust funds (regulated bank investment funds) to their participants.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the application of section 584(h) of such Code.
